reviews.review: só sim kk te prende mt no jogo eu instalei e ja zerei fiquei a madrugada inteira só jogando isso....BOLO!
Besides this and the sequel I haven't played puzzle games quite like this. A simple concept but very tight controls and it really makes you think on how to get to the next area. Hilarious to boot.

Nemrég vettem meg, de már most kijátszottam és még mindig lekötnek a plusz pályák egyszerűen zseniális ez a játék. A story nagyon jó, a vége szintén kiemelkedő. Ajánlom mindenkinek, aki szeretne játszani a világ talán egyik legjobb puzzle game-jével. Az egyetlen baja max az, hogy rövid a storyja. Ja és ne játszátok magyar szinkronnal! Angolul magyar felirattal sokkal jobb nem csak Gladosnak, hanem mindennek a hangja
great game music at the end is fire

Siempre he querido jugar uno de los Portal y decidí comenzar por este, quede encantado con él. Su mecánica principal y sus físicas están muy pero muy bien pulidas aunque sea un juego del año 2007. Como podes ver a través de los portales y la infinidad de detalles que tiene es maravillosa. Su duración es corta pero tiene rejugabilidad con los desafíos que son bastante difíciles. Si tienes que elegir entre comprar el 1 y el 2 puede que vayas por el 2 pero si tienes dinero (o cuando esta en oferta) comprarte los dos es una excelente opción.
Uma experiência curta porém muito boa. Ótima gameplay e puzzles bem elaborados.
It's always fun to come back and play this game. Currently playing it along with the half life games.
This game is so cool. Its a 3D puzzle adventure that is unforgettable. I definately recommend this game to others.
игра класс, без подробностей. просто класс
This game is legend. Every player, who played half-life should give a chance this game even is not shooter, but puzzle game. It's little bit short. but rly depends on ur skill.
Muy entretenido, al principio aburre un poco pero entra mas avanzas mas bueno se pone :D
One of my absolute favorite games
Si eres una persona que le gusta los puzzles te encantara, y aun así se los recociendo a todo el mundo.
Curto e desafiador este e Portal

总之好玩就完事了
Very good but its very hard in the higher levels over chamber 16. 7/10

A wonderful puzzle game steeped in the deep world building of the half-life universe, portal is an intriguing and thoroughly entertaining game.

As with most Valve games, Portal has aged fairly well. Thanks to the community, it remains as relevant as ever, and continues to attract new players. Whilst it's a little rough around the edges when compared to it's successor, Portal still manages to deliver a short (~3 hrs), but effective experience that certainly gets you thinking at times.
Игра очень крутая. Особенно звуковые эффекты и анимация
A horror game masquerading as a funny sci-fi puzzle game. This game is timeless, near-flawless, and a must-play for everyone.

Very fun first person puzzle game with a good story.
Highly recommended.
It's kind of a must play for PC gamers. You don't have to like it. But it really is necessary to at least play it once.
Хорошая игра, крутая реализация порталов и прочего, советую хуле
Corto pero adictivo. de los mejores juegos que compre

After 3.9 hours i beat the game (story mode not bonus maps) It was really fun i definitely recommend it. The only thing is, you need to be very smart. Most parts lvl. 18+ really stumped me so good luck!!
after 17 hours i got all achievments and i can say after doing all of these chambers 100% you`l get the biggest dopamine rush ever

An absolute classic game and inventive puzzle game.  Everything still holds up today.
Este juego es como mi pene, corto pero intenso. Muy buen juego la verdad, para jugar y rejugar.
This game is a classic, and an amazing one at that. From puzzles to fratricide (the achivement), this game is awesome, especially Still Alive, and GLaDOS's voice. Overall this is a great game.
It's portal, it's awesome. Old, but graphics are still fine and the puzzles are the main draw here.

Genial juego rompecabezas con interesante historia de trasfondo y un buen añadido al universo Half Life. Si quieres conseguir todos los logros del juego ya puedes ser paciente, atento y habilidoso, porque vas a odiar los desafíos aun después de todo lo aprendido al completar modo historia. Aun así un juegazo más que recomendado para los fans de los rompecabezas y Half Life.
